programme.title: Budak Magik Ep14
programme.desc: Episod 14 memaparkan kisah Imran melihat gelagat ayahnya, Johan bercanda dengan Suraya dan beliau juga melihat sendiri bagaimana ayahnya sangat suka pada makcik Suraya. Sohot dan Salim pengsan setelah disergah oleh jin Rakib, Hariman pula mahu Sohot dan Salim menjadi hantu serta hendak menakut-nakutkan Haikal dan kawan-kawannya, walau bagaimanapun secara tiba-tiba jin bernama Rakib muncul, ketiga-tiga mereka jatuh pengsan. Hariman merasa terkejut apabila Haikal dan rakanrakannya mucul bersama cikgu Razif kerana hendak bermain guli. Hariman syak bahawa segala pergerakan dan perancangannya sedang dipantau oleh seseorang sehingga semua perancangan beliau menemui kegagalan. Hariman sedang merancang hendak pecah masuk ke dalam rumah Wan, nenek Imran dengan tujuan hendak mencari batu permata tersebut.

programme.title: Corpse Party
programme.desc: Pada suatu malam hujan selepas perayaan sekolah, sekumpulan pelajar dari Sekolah Menengah Kisaragi memutuskan untuk mempersembahkan pesona "Sachiko Ever After", yang akan menyatukan mereka selama-lamanya sebagai kawan. Setelah upacara itu selesai, gempa bumi mengejut membawa mereka ke Heavenly Host, sebuah sekolah rendah yang dirobohkan berikutan pembunuhan dan kehilangan beberapa kakitangan dan pelajarnya.

programme.title: Bodyguard S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Memaparkan Shamsul masih syak bapa tirinya Kamal bukan lelaki yang baik, Farish menasihat agar menerima kehidupan bapa tiri seadanya. Salina pula didapati bukan kekasih Kamal, dia sebenarnya gadis suruhan (call girl) untuk melayani klien Kamal. dalam perniagaannya. Ryan rakan sekampung Salina menasihatnya supaya berhenti melakukan pekerjaan tersebut. Shamsul pula cuba ditembak oleh seseorang semasa bersama-sama dengan Farish. Shamsul syak Kamal yang merancang pembunuhan tersebut kerana dia anak tunggal dalam keluarganya. Kematiannya akan memboleh Kamal menguasai harta keluarganya. Siasatan oleh Farish mendapati Pak Long Shamsul yang merancangpembunuhan tersebut. Bakri, bodyguard kepada Sarrah mendapati mereka diekori oleh Taufik. Berlaku pergaduhan yang akhirnya Taufik tertangkap.

programme.title: Hantu Tok Mudim
programme.desc: Tok Mudim adalah seorang ahli tradisi berkhatan yang terkenal, jasanya amat dicari oleh ibu bapa apabila anak-anak mereka memasuki akil baligh. Namun begitu kemahirannya tercabar apabila khidmatnya diuji ke atas seorang dewasa, anak Ketua Kampung, yang secara tidak sengaja tertinggal daripada menjalani ibadah itu pada usia normal... iaitu ketika memasuki akil baligh. Untuk menjaga kerahsiaan keadaan yang rumit ini...Tok Mudim telah ditugaskan untuk melakukan ibadah itu pada larut malam dan atas sebab-sebab yang tidak disedarinya, dia mengganggu prosedur yang kelihatan seperti rutin itu. Semuanya terbongkar apabila seluruh kampung mengambil berat tentang kegagalannya. Dipersalahkan kerana merosakkan kehidupan anak Ketua Kampung, Tok Mudim menjadi sasaran penduduk kampung, kerana ingin membalas dendam atas perbuatan salah ini, sasarannya membawa kepada kematiannya yang tidak lama lagi ketika cuba melarikan diri. Tidak lama selepas kematiannya yang tragis, hantu Tok Mudim dilihat mengganas penduduk kampung itu.

programme.title: Ong Bak: Muay Thai Warriors
programme.desc: Apabila kepala patung yang suci di sebuah kampung dicuri, seorang ahli seni mempertahankan diri pergi ke bandar besar dan mendapati dirinya mengambil dunia bawah tanah untuk mendapatkannya.

programme.title: Santau Merasuk Ep4
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Nina terperanjat apabila pada satu malam, Arifah datang ke rumah bersama Mat. Nina jadi serba salah mahu mengizinkan Mat masuk, kerana Halim tiada di rumah. Tetapi Mat terus merempuh masuk dengan alasan, dia sudah nampak lembaga yang berkeliaran di dalam rumah itu dan diikuti dengan jeritan Echa. Ketika Mat sedang memulihkan semula Echa, Halim pulang dan menyaksikan segalanya. Terjadi pertelingkahan antara Halim dan Mat. AkhirnyaHalim menghalau Mat bersama Arifah keluar dari rumahnya

programme.title: UC 2
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri yang bahagia mula mengalami mimpi ngeri di rumah mereka apabila perbuatan ghaib dan misteri mula berlaku.

programme.title: Budak Magik Ep4
programme.desc: Memaparkan kisah bagaimana Imran yang masih sesat di hutan bertemu seekor jin bernama Rakib yang membantunya keluar. Semenjak peristiwa itu Imran sering di datangi Rakib yang cuba memberi peringatan tentang sesuatu perkara buruk akan berlaku namun tidak diendah Imran. Prilaku Imran yang seolah-olah bercakap bersendirian ketika berbicara dengan Rakib sempat dilihat oleh Maira yang yakin bahawa kuasa magik Imran ada kaitan dengan kuasa jin.Maira cuba berkongsi apa yang telah dilihat tentang Imran besama Zara yang kebetulan datang untuk menunjuk kuasa magik yang dia miliki. Maira yang keliru serta takut apabila mendapat tahu Imran, Haikal dan Zara memiliki kuasa magik enggan mendekati dan berkawan dengan mereka lagi.

programme.title: Seekers Underground Ep078
programme.desc: Seekers kembali dengan nama baru Seekers Underground. Dengan teknologi baru serta tinjaun ke lokasi yang belum pernah diterokai

programme.title: Apartment
programme.desc: Sebuah apartmen di mana pembunuhan telah berlaku dihantui oleh beberapa siri kejadian paranormal dan tiada penyewa pernah tinggal lebih daripada 14 hari. Seorang novelis paranormal muda berpindah ke apartmen untuk menyiasat kes hantu wanita tanpa kepala dan mengalami beberapa peristiwa yang sangat menakutkan.

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Tania, seorang wartawan menjalankan penyiasatan tentang kes pembunuhan rakannya, Johari yang menyiasat skandal syarikat kewangan. Skandal tersebut melibatkan bapa Sheila. Dibantu oleh seorang jurufoto, Norman yang ingin membersihkan namanya kerana sebelum Johari mati dibunuh, terdapat pertengkaran antara mereka berdua. Mereka pun mula menyiasat punca sebenar pembunuhan Johari.

programme.title: Puteri Impian 2
programme.desc: Gadis kilang yang menolak lamaran seorang kerabat diraja Tengku Faizal, menaruh hati terhadap jurukamera stesen televisyen, Zul. Nora menyukai Zul tetapi dia telah pun menjalin hubungan bersama Lisa. Adik kepada Tengku Faizal, Tengku Farid ingin membawa semula Nora kembali ke abangnya. Tekad, dia ingin mengangkat semula maruah abangnya.

programme.title: XX Ray 2
programme.desc: Bekerja sebagai saintis kadet, Tina berasa ditipu apabila Johan mendakwa dia yang mencipta mesin pelupusan laser walhal ia merupakan hasil cetusan idea dari Tina. Ingin menghalang niat jahat Johan, Tina meminta bantuan Amir. Namun, keduanya terkena pancaran laser mesin itu dalam cubaan untuk menghalang Johan dan telah dihantar ke zaman Kesultanan Melayu Melaka.

programme.title: Baginda
programme.desc: Diwariskan untuk mengurus sebuah kolej swasta di Johor Bahru oleh pakciknya, Azian terpaksa melalui pelbagai cabaran untuk menaikkan semula martabat sekolah yang sudah merudum prestasinya itu. Hampir sahaja putus asa namun sikap dedikasinya untuk mendidik anak bangsa membuatkan Azian ingin terus menjalankan amanah pakciknya.

programme.title: Gila - Gila Pengantin Remaja
programme.desc: Pasangan remaja yang bakal menduduki peperiksaan SPM, Amir dan Mastura berikrar ingin berkahwin selepas tamatnya pengajian di universiti. Namun, Fandi yang juga rakan sekelas Mastura mencemburui percintaan mereka. SPM pun tiba tetapi Mastura terlewat menghadiri ujian Matematik dan berasa amat kecewa kerana menganggap dia telah pun gagal. Kakak Mastura, Anita pula ingin Mastura mencari calon suami yang kaya. Perasaan kecewa mula menyelubungi diri Amir apabila mendapat tahu Mastura ditunangkan dengan Fandi. Mengetahui perihal sebenar mengapa mereka akan dikahwinkan, Amir membawa Mastura lari ke selatan Thailand. Bermulalah kekecohan antara mereka semua dalam sekuel kepada Gila-Gila Pengantin ini.

programme.title: Bukan Cinta Malaikat
programme.desc: Reyhan, seorang sukarelawan Muslim Care yang berasal dari Bandung jatuh hati kepada gadis Malaysia bernama Dewi sejak dia menyelamatkan Dewi daripada satu insiden ketika mereka berada di Madinah. Walau bagaimanapun, cinta Reyhan itu terhalang apabila Dewi mempunyai kekasih bernama Adam. Dalam masa yang sama, seorang gadis bernama Aliyah pula menaruh hati kepada Reyhan.

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Tania, seorang wartawan menjalankan penyiasatan tentang kes pembunuhan rakannya, Johari yang menyiasat skandal syarikat kewangan. Skandal tersebut melibatkan bapa Sheila. Dibantu oleh seorang jurufoto, Norman yang ingin membersihkan namanya kerana sebelum Johari mati dibunuh, terdapat pertengkaran antara mereka berdua. Mereka pun mula menyiasat punca sebenar pembunuhan Johari.

programme.title: Azura 2012
programme.desc: Azura, seorang gadis remaja yang gigih hadapi cabaran hidup untuk mencapai cita-citanya. Dia tinggal bersama ibu saudaranya setelah kedua ibu bapanya meninggal dunia dalam satu tragedi. Azura kemudiannya menjadi mahasiswa di sebuah universiti swasta dan menjalinkan hubungan mesra dengan Zek, seorang anak hartawan. Walau bagaimanapun, cinta mereka dihalang oleh bapa Zek dan mereka terpaksa melalui pelbagai dugaan.

programme.title: Femina
programme.desc: Perjuangan untuk mendapatkan hak setara antara jantina terutamanya wanita lantang dibicarakan di dalam majalah Femina. Tina, tegas memperjuangkan pendiriannya manakala Anita tidak berapa menyukai cara Tina. Femina telah menjadi satu platform anti-lelaki. Pertemuan Tina bersama Pyan mula mengubah pandangan ekstrem Tina namun perasaan dilema mula menguasai diri apabila dituduh sebagai pembelot wanita.

programme.title: XX Ray
programme.desc: Obsesinya terhadap angkasa lepas telah membuatkan Amir untuk mencipta sebuah topi keledar. Topi keledar ini merupakan penemuan baru apabila ia menggunakan kuasa tahi bintang. Sesiapa sahaja yang memakainya boleh melihat menembusi apa sahaja yang mereka inginkan. Kekacauan berlaku apabila topi itu telah menyebabkan Amir bertukar menjadi halimunan.

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Tania, seorang wartawan menjalankan penyiasatan tentang kes pembunuhan rakannya, Johari yang menyiasat skandal syarikat kewangan. Skandal tersebut melibatkan bapa Sheila. Dibantu oleh seorang jurufoto, Norman yang ingin membersihkan namanya kerana sebelum Johari mati dibunuh, terdapat pertengkaran antara mereka berdua. Mereka pun mula menyiasat punca sebenar pembunuhan Johari.

programme.title: Gila - Gila Pengantin
programme.desc: Aliah seorang gadis yang ingin berkahwin tetapi mempunyai satu fobia dimana dia takut untuk bersanding dia atas pelamin setelah apa yang terjadi keatas dirinya semasa dia kecil. Dalam masa yang sama, Johari juga mempunyai masalah yang sama dengan Aliah. Mereka telah bertemu di dalam dunia cyber dan beramah mesra dengan perbualan masing-masing sehingga hari ini. Rupa-rupanya ada kenangan di antara mereka berdua. Namun mereka bakal berkahwin dengan pasangan yang berlainan dari mereka dan kedua-duanya perlu bersanding di atas pelamin ketika majlis perkahwinan.

programme.title: Puteri Impian
programme.desc: Pekerja kilang, Puteri Nora sentiasa mengimpikan untuk menjadi seorang puteri raja. Impiannya menjadi kenyataan apabila dia diterima menyertai pertandingan "Memburu Impian". Kehidupannya berubah sekelip mata apabila bertemu Tengku Faizal, seorang putera raja. Namun, Zul, jurukameranya dalam rancangan itu turut menyukai Puteri Nora. Pilihan harus dibuat antara kemewahan atau kebebasan.

programme.title: Azura 2012
programme.desc: Azura, seorang gadis remaja yang gigih hadapi cabaran hidup untuk mencapai cita-citanya. programme.title: Jengka
programme.desc: Nini mengalami keguguran semasa melarikan diri di ladang kelapa sawit. Namun, satu perkara aneh terjadi apabila bayinya dikatakan masih hidup dan dilarikan oleh penunggu. Orang kampung berusaha membantu mencari Nini dan anaknya, namun perkara seram terjadi sepanjang pencarian mereka.

Orang kampung berusaha membantu mencari Nini dan anaknya, namun perkara seram terjadi sepanjang pencarian mereka.

programme.title: Bob Punya Baby
programme.desc: seorang lelaki dan seorang wanita masing-masing memalsukan profail mereka dengan menggunakan gambar orang lain dan nama samaran untuk profail facebook mereka

programme.title: Gerak Khas The Movie III
programme.desc: Unit Gerak Khas cuba menyelesaikan kes pembunuhan Suzana di sebuah pangsapuri mewah yang dipercayai mempunyai kaitan dengan Ramon (Faizal Hussein). Ramon merupakan adik kepada Frankie. penjenayah yang ditumpaskan oleh Unit Gerak Khas dalam satu operasi menentang kumpulan militan dan sindiket pengedaran dadah 2 tahun yang lalu.

programme.title: Hello Itu Bff I
programme.desc: Selepas menamatkan pelajaran di luar negara, seorang wanita muda pulang ke tanah air dengan perasaan tidak sabar ingin bertemu bff tersayangnya. Namun kehadiran BFF baharu dalam kehidupan kawannya telah menimbulkan rasa cemburu dan bengang dalam dirinya. dia mencuba pelbagai helah untuk memisahkan mereka dan akibatnya berlaku pergaduhan antara dia dan sahabat baru kawannya

programme.title: Tmo Syawal Yang Hilang
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Syawal Yang Hilang

programme.title: Mak, Adib Pulang
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Adib seorang anak yatim piatu, diambil oleh sebuah keluarga dan dijadikan anak angkat. Adib merasakan dia telah mengkhianati ibunya sehingga menyebabkan dia lari balik ke rumah ibu kandungnya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep8
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: 12 Ghost Fingers
programme.desc: Chow terpaksa berpindah ke rumah datuknya selepas penceraian ibu bapanya. chow mendaftar kan diri di sekolah san min. pada hari pertamanya, rakan sekelasnya memberitahunya bahawa sekolah itu membentuk mata. semasa dalam perjalanan pulang dari sekolah, chow dpt rasakan ada sesuatu telah berlaku disekolah itu dan dia ingin menyiasat apa yang dirahsiakan oleh pihak sekolah selama ini.

programme.title: Maria Mariana 1
programme.desc: Dua beradik perempuan dibesarkan dalam sebuah keluarga, namun adik memiliki sikap negatif dan berprasangka tidak baik terhadap kasih sayang yang diberikan oleh kedua ibu bapanya dan merasakan ibu bapanya memberi kasih sayag yang lebih kepada kakaknya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep13
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Setinggan
programme.desc: Penduduk di suatu setingan diganggu hantu. Mereka berkerja sama untuk mencari jalan penyelesaian. Akhirnya mereka berjaya menghalau hantu daripada menggangu setinggan mereka.

programme.title: Tmo Adnan Sempit
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Adnan Sempit

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep9
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Sengketa Cinta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuda telah ditipu dalam perniagaan . Untuk membalas dendam dia mencolek seorang wanita dalam usaha untuk menjejak penipu itu. Bagaimanapun akhirnya dia jatuh cinta dengan wanita tersebut lalu membawa balik menemui ibubapanya.

programme.title: Tetamu Ramadan
programme.desc: Hazim trauma kerana tidak sempat bertemu ibunya. Dia menyalahkan dirinya kerana menghampakan Halimah. Ketika menghadap jenazah Halimah, tiba-tiba Hazim ditarik Khaidir ketika Hazim mahu mencium ibunya. Ketika itu Khaidir memberitahu yang Halimah bukan ibu kandungnya.

programme.title: Terjebak Nostalgia
programme.desc: Raisa mengejar impiannya bersama kekasihnya di Sora ke New York. Kehadiran Reza yang menemaninya semasa berada di New York membawanya ke dalam situasi yang rumit.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S14 Ep1
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep13
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Pontianak Menjerit
programme.desc: Seorang jutawan telah mewasiatkan kepada peguamnya supaya mencari waris-warisnya yang berhak menerima harta bernilai lebih dari RM30 juta. Semua waris disyaratkan supaya berada di bangalo arwah di sebuah bukit peranginan selama 33 hari bagi melayakkan mereka mewarisi harta pusaka tersebut.

programme.title: Relationshit
programme.desc: Alitt, seorang pengarang terlaris, yang sentiasa disokong oleh teman wanitanya, Wina. Namun, hubungan mereka terjalin kerana Wina akur dengan permintaan ibunya. Sehingga akhirnya Alitt bertemu dengan Vivi.

programme.title: 12 Ghost Fingers
programme.desc: Chow terpaksa berpindah ke rumah datuknya selepas penceraian ibu bapanya. chow mendaftar kan diri di sekolah san min. pada hari pertamanya, rakan sekelasnya memberitahunya bahawa sekolah itu membentuk mata. semasa dalam perjalanan pulang dari sekolah, chow dpt rasakan ada sesuatu telah berlaku disekolah itu dan dia ingin menyiasat apa yang dirahsiakan oleh pihak sekolah selama ini.

programme.title: Tmo Adnan Sempit
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Adnan Sempit

programme.title: Takbir Semalam
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Mak Yah terkenal dengan sikap yang suka memaki hamun dan bercakap kasar. Tahun ini merupakan tahun pertama bagi Mak Yah untuk menyambut Hari Raya seorang diri. Orang kampung sedih melihat Mak Yah kerana dia masih lagi belum boleh menerima hakikat kerana semua ini berlaku di atas sikapnya yang sering memarahi anak menantunya sehingga mereka sekeluarga nekad keluar dari rumah dan terlibat dengan kemalangan yang meragut nyawa mereka semua.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep9
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Gang Preed
programme.desc: Kisah pelajar sekolah menengah yang sangat meminati filem seram. Mo adalah pengarah dan juga mengetuai kumpulan kecil ini. Suatu hari Mo terserempak dengan Prang, seorang gadis misteri yang dipindahkan dari sekolah lain. Mo memberitahu rakan-rakannya bahawa dia benar-benar mahukan dia sebagai peneraju filem baharunya. Masalah antara pembuat filem yang buruk dan gadis pelik bermula, bersama dengan persahabatan dan cinta yang mula mekar tanpa mereka sedari.

programme.title: Hujan Bulan Juni
programme.desc: Pingkan (Velove Vexia), seorang pensyarah muda di Universitas Sastera Jepang Indonesia, berpeluang belajar di Jepun selama dua tahun. Sarwono (Adipati Dolken) sedih mendengar berita bahawa dia akan ditinggalkan oleh Pingkan.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep1
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: From London To Bali
programme.desc: Krisya yang telah jatuh cinta terhadap seorang jejaka bernama Irfan. Bagaimanapun cintanya ditolak kerana Irfan lebih tertarik kepada wanita `berisi`. Oleh itu, Krisya kini nekad untuk menaikkan badannya demi jejaka impiannya.

programme.title: Tmo Semerah Cinta Stileto
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Semerah Cinta Stileto

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep10
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Kidnap
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki berjanji dengan teman wanitanya bahawa dia akan bersamanya pada hari lahirnya iaitu dua hari kemudian. Kemudian pada petang itu semasa berhenti untuk minum di sebuah bar, dia tersilap diculik kerana menyerupai anak seorang jutawan.

programme.title: Abang Sate Pengkolan Masjid
programme.desc: kisah percintaan seorang penjual sate dan seorang remaja perempuan.

programme.title: Hello Itu Bff I
programme.desc: Selepas menamatkan pelajaran di luar negara, seorang wanita muda pulang ke tanah air dengan perasaan tidak sabar ingin bertemu bff tersayangnya. Namun kehadiran BFF baharu dalam kehidupan kawannya telah menimbulkan rasa cemburu dan bengang dalam dirinya. dia mencuba pelbagai helah untuk memisahkan mereka dan akibatnya berlaku pergaduhan antara dia dan sahabat baru kawannya

programme.title: Jom Wayang S14 Ep2
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep1
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Pening-Pening Lalat
programme.desc: Dino adalah banduan yang berjaya melarikan diri dari penjara. Polis menyiarkan berita mengenainya dan menawarkan hadiah RM10,000 kepada sesiapa yang berjaya menangkapnya. Jadi Dino bersembunyi di dalam hutan di mana dia bertemu Zakaria dan Aliza.

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang juga seorang peninju berhijrah kesebuah negara lain untuk memulakan hidup baru . pada mulanya nasib tidak menyebelahi lelaki tersebut dan hidupnya berubah selepas menemui seorang rakan yang banyak membantu . setelah gagal mencari pekerjaan rakan lelaki itu mencadangkan dia menyertai liga muay thay secara kecil-kecilan .

programme.title: Gang Preed
programme.desc: Kisah pelajar sekolah menengah yang sangat meminati filem seram. Mo adalah pengarah dan juga mengetuai kumpulan kecil ini. Suatu hari Mo terserempak dengan Prang, seorang gadis misteri yang dipindahkan dari sekolah lain. Mo memberitahu rakan-rakannya bahawa dia benar-benar mahukan dia sebagai peneraju filem baharunya. Masalah antara pembuat filem yang buruk dan gadis pelik bermula, bersama dengan persahabatan dan cinta yang mula mekar tanpa mereka sedari.

programme.title: Tmo Semerah Cinta Stileto
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Semerah Cinta Stileto

programme.title: Syif Malam Raya
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang empat rakan yang mengalami kejadian aneh ketika mereka dalam perjalanan pulang ke kampung pada malam raya. Zaid dan Hisyam menumpangkan Mera serta Yoh dalam perjalanan menghantar mayat ke Ipoh.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep10
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Fainow
programme.desc: kisah pergolakan rumah tangga sepasang suami isteri selepas sang isteri mendapat tahu kecurangan suaminya.

programme.title: Sengketa Cinta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuda telah ditipu dalam perniagaan . Untuk membalas dendam dia mencolek seorang wanita dalam usaha untuk menjejak penipu itu. Bagaimanapun akhirnya dia jatuh cinta dengan wanita tersebut lalu membawa balik menemui ibubapanya.

programme.title: Gara Gara Bakso Jadi I Love You So
programme.desc: Apa yang berlaku jika penjual bebola daging berkencan dengan kumpulan lelaki terkenal? Alya dan Revan mendapat respon positif daripada netizen walaupun mereka berpura-pura.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep101
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Star Ep9
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Sejadah Ep25
programme.desc: Sejadah (Sehat Jadi Ibadah) adalah program yang akan memberikan maklumat mengenai kesihatan dari perspektif perubatan dan aspek lain. Dihoskan oleh pakar kesihatan Dr Cahyono, Sp.Naturophaty dan Ustadz Solmed.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep54
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep102
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Jodoh Anti Fana No Tipu Tipu
programme.desc: Demi status, Risa berpura-pura menjadi orang kaya untuk mencari pasangan hidupnya. Mampukah Risa bertemu pasangan yang boleh menerima dia seadanya?

programme.title: The Sultan S2 Ep46
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: Kata Ustadz Solmed Ep8
programme.desc: Kata Ustadz Solmed merupakan program bual bicara yang dibimbing oleh pengacara dan ustaz terkenal yang akan fokus membincangkan tentang masalah yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat sehinggalah masalah rumah tangga dari sudut agama.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep5
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.desc: Demi status, Risa berpura-pura menjadi orang kaya untuk mencari pasangan hidupnya. Mampukah Risa bertemu pasangan yang boleh menerima dia seadanya?

Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Star Ep11
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: D’Academy 5 - Konser Welcome To Indosiar Family
programme.desc: D’Academy 5 - Konser Welcome To Indosiar Family! Konsert menyambut bintang D'Academy 5. Dimeriahkan oleh Fildan, Putri, Ical, Aulia, Randa, Selfi, Melly, Nia, Iqhbal, Gunawan, Waode, Jessica, Jamila, Selvi, Anna, Findi, Via, Anyun, Ali Akbar, Doni Dion, Rena Reni dan ramai lagi!

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep104
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. programme.title: Cowok Cool Bikin Klepek Klepek
programme.desc: Reno dilabel mamba hitam kerana dia suka memakai pakaian hitam. Dia mempunyai sikap yang tenang dan garang yang membuatkan gadis mengaguminya! Dia menjual kopi di jalanan, termasuk dodol. Pelanggannya kebanyakannya perempuan. Namun, Nadya tidak berminat dengan Reno. Dia benci dia! Apa sebenarnya yang berlaku?

programme.title: Konser Terima Kasih Dangdut
programme.desc: Persembahan istimewa dari rakyat dangdut tanah air! Temui kisah menarik dan fenomena artis dangdut dari semasa ke semasa.

programme.title: Mas Ganteng Pawang Hatiku
programme.desc: Borhan, seorang pawang ramalan cuaca, mempunyai kehidupan cinta yang rumit dengan seorang pakar psikiatri yang cantik, Sarah. Dengan kuasanya sebagai pawang ramalan cuaca, cinta mereka dapat bersatu.

programme.title: Shades Of The Heart
programme.desc: Novelist who just get divorced wish to write a novel based on his life. In the process, he met people with stories about the past, memory and death. These encounters caused a change in his thoughts...

programme.title: The Box
programme.desc: A washed-up former hit producer and a young man with stage fear while aspiring to be a singer head off on a road trip filled with music and jamming sessions.

programme.title: More Than Family
programme.desc: College student To-il was pregnant for 5 months and decided to marry her younger boyfriend. Her mother and stepfather opposed the decision, she hence set off to find her biological father.

programme.title: Midnight Runners
programme.desc: Two students from Korean National Police University decide to work together and track down a kidnapping incident.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective
programme.desc: A crime-enthusiast blogger and a veteran detective team up to prove the innocence of their mutual friend who's been framed for a horrific murder.

programme.title: The Plan Man
programme.desc: An obsessive-compulsive man who plans out every detail of his life came across with a woman with free spirit.

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: A music teacher was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation.

programme.title: Jazzy Misfits
programme.desc: A jazz singer goes on a day trip with her estranged mother in search of her younger sister. The two start to discover a different side to each other as they roam around in Seoul.

programme.title: Rampant
programme.desc: Returning from imprisonment abroad, a prince and his fellow countrymen band together to battle bloodthirsty demons in ancient Korea.

programme.title: 1987: When The Day Comes
programme.desc: In 1987, a pro-democracy student activist was captured and tortured to death by the police. The authorities tried to cover up the case, but the ordinary people fight to reveal the truth.

programme.title: Bank Attack
programme.desc: Desperate for money to save his sick daughters life, a father decides to rob a bank. Things become much more complicated, when real bank robbers enter the bank.

programme.title: The Tenor - Lirico Spinto
programme.desc: A strong partnership and friendship begins when a talented Korean vocalist met a Japanese music producer. At the peak of his career, he was diagnosed with thyroid cancer and might loss his voice...

programme.title: The Accidental Detective 2: In Action
programme.desc: A homicide detective and a comic book storekeeper recruit an online private eye to launch a full-fledged investigation on a murder case.

programme.title: Master
programme.desc: An intellectual crime investigation team goes after One Network, a company involved in a massive fraud and corruption case in Korea.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: A debt collector has liver cancer and has to get a liver transplant in 10 days. A seductive swindler agrees to donate her liver only if he tracks down the man who put her in prison.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent Jun
programme.desc: While under the influence of alcohol, an unsuccessful comic book writer draws a comic about his life as a former NIS hitman, and runs into trouble when it gets posted online.

programme.title: Remember You
programme.desc: A lawyer suffering from severe memory loss and a total change of character investigates his past and his connection to a woman he meets in a hospital.

programme.title: The Swordsman
programme.desc: Joseon’s greatest swordsman went hiding after the fall of King Gwanghae. When his daughter is taken hostage by a Qing envoy, he has no choice but to raise his sword again to rescue her.

programme.title: Project Wolf Hunting
programme.desc: During the extradition to Korea, a group of dangerous criminals united to stage an escape from the floating prison.

programme.title: The Classified File
programme.desc: A veteran detective and a fortune teller form an unlikely partnership in order to rescue a kidnapped child before it's too late.

programme.title: The Magician
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: In Our Prime
programme.desc: Genius Mathematician defected from the North tried to hide his past eventually started teaching a student who gave up on Maths the right way to find the answer.

programme.title: I Am The King
programme.desc: A runaway prince meets a slave who bears a strikingly similar appearance to himself. The prince gets mistaken as the slave and the slave is crowned as King.

programme.title: The Closet
programme.desc: After losing his wife, a father tries to start over in a new home with his daughter. But things take a turn when strange noises trickle out of the closet, and his daughter goes missing.

programme.title: Strawberryman Ep7
programme.desc: Breaking the traditional mode of music variety show, around 24 groups of rock bands, folk bands, hip-hop, electronic and other styles of musicians are invited to perform in an outdoor concert and become a member of Strawberryman. The guests include Jam Hsiao, GAI, and Zhang Ya Dong.

programme.title: The Shape Of Culture Season 2 Ep5
programme.desc: The cultural show invited Shan Jixiang, Yun Zhou, Yan Xiao, Niu Junfeng as "youth troupe" to present new wonders, new landmarks, new sights and the diversity of world heritages and civilization from multiple perspectives and to undercover the story of the World Heritage sites behind.

programme.title: The Talent Ep9
programme.desc: The program setting is based on eight concepts while the teenagers would have to use creative thinking to stimulate their imagination and use paper and pen, as well as programming, to solve different problems. programme.title: Tour With Classics Season 2 Ep6
programme.desc: The program helps to explore humanistic perception and tourism experience via outdoor visit and leads the audience to experience the beautiful scenery, spread humanities, review history, re-visit classics by feeling the soul of cultural spirit.

programme.desc: As a fashion reality show, Justin Huang, Austin Li, Laurinda Ho and Shang Guan Zhe are invited to cooperate with the young talents to complete different tasks and outfits in the show to demonstrate their aesthetics and attitudes, and also reflect the trend and attitude towards life among the young generation.

programme.title: New Chinese Dating Event Season 2 Ep6
programme.desc: A blind date program hosted by Meng Fei. Participants will join a blind date with their parents, to explore the topics of love and marriage. The difference of value of marriage between two generations will be shown.

programme.title: The Lucky 2% Ep6
programme.desc: This is the first reality show about helping and rescuing the strays. Guests from different fields are invited to become volunteers in the animal welfare center, to provide the stray animals with treatment and love, and finally find suitable adopters for them.

programme.desc: A documentary cultural program focuses on intangible cultural heritage. programme.desc: Memory of China is the first history program of China, the TV program unveils secrets of important historical events, mega projects and the untold stories behind those crucial decisions of this country.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10531054
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46034604
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46044605
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2028
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3595
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2625
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M) Ep392
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2030
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep152
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: My Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a Korean movie, this is the love story of school swimmer Zhou Xiao Qi and a transfer student You Yong Ci. Zhou falls in love with You at first sight in high school but You leaves suddenly one day without saying goodbye. As fate brings them back together years later, can they get the spark back in their relationship?

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: “In the Mood for Love” is Wong Kar-Wai’s most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses are having an affair.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow circus performers who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong’s elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her team’s performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chan’s help.

programme.title: Undiscovered Tomb
programme.desc: On the remote border between China and India, adventurer Ivy scours the land in search of the undiscovered tomb rumored to house the long-lost Pills of Eternity. However, she is not the only one searching for these powerful pills.

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Ru’s financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the client’s data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Touch of the Light
programme.desc: A blind but talented pianist Siang encounters an unrecognized but skilful dancer Chieh. Chieh is attracted to the courageous Siang while Siang is fascinated by the adventurous Chieh. Their friendship grows as Siang and Chieh pursue their dreams together. Sandrine Pinna was awarded Best Actress for her role as Chieh in the 2012 Taipei Film Festival.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend’s wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge – will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Legendary Amazons
programme.desc: Produced by Jackie Chan, this is the story about the fabled Yang family of female generals in feudal China. Yang Zong Bao, the last man standing in the Yang family, dies in a battle when defending the Song Dynasty from invaders. Zong Bao’s wife Mu Gui Ying steps up to lead other widows of the Yang’s into battle to continue their husband’s legacy.

programme.title: Namiya
programme.desc: Namiya is a Chinese adaptation of the novel, Miracles Of The Namiya General Store, by best-selling author, Keigo Higashino. When three runaways shack up in an abandoned general store, a supernatural correspondence connects them to many lives that were all touched by the owner of the store years before they were born.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Police’s Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Binding Souls
programme.desc: Five old friends revisit their school before it closes down to find records of paranormal existence, including the mysterious case of a missing student. The school was previously occupied by the Japanese for various “human experiments” and is known to be haunted. Can the five friends get out of the school safely?

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters’ best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: Shaolin Kung Fu Kids
programme.desc: Bo is separated from other Shaolin disciples when they are on the way to perform. He meets a family from Hong Kong and gets help from them. When this family faces difficulties, Bo uses his kung fu to help them solve those problems.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughter’s diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xing’s son attempts drug trafficking to save his father’s studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return…

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: During Tang Dynasty, two police deputies are tasked to catch the new leader of a revolutionary faction known as the House of Flying Daggers. They capture a blind dancer suspected of being the daughter of the ex-leader but both fall in love with her. When passion turns into hatred and loyalty turns into betrayal, love will be the deadliest weapon!

programme.title: Two Wrongs Make a Right
programme.desc: When an internationally-renowned Feng Shui Master, Ray, forecasts a predestined doom ahead, he sets out to find an ill-fated wretch to serve as the scapegoat of his mishaps and finds Pei Pei. Little did Ray expect to fall in love with her and must decide whether their relationship is worth the series of unfortunate events that would follow.

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: Some believe that the world is one of many; that our existence is merely an intersection between countless dimensions - known and unknown. We run into strangers we don't see, hum to tunes we don't hear. Most of us remain ignorant, but there are always others who would try everything to beseech the truth if not the thrill - that is, to see ghosts just for the sake of living once. Five teenage thrill-seekers embark on the journey to explore the lurid landscape of the other-world. Oblivious to the underlying principal of the "10", their morbid appetite for fear is to be met with, and only too excessively... Following their quintessential horror sensations The Eye and The Eye 2, Pang Brothers have yet conceived an electrifying young breed of the series - The Eye 10 - a nightmarish rollercoaster ride that sees no end...

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor’s death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: A heroic family is double crossed and massacred on the battle field with only two of the brothers surviving the slaughter. One of the brothers (Gordon Liu), escapes to a Shaolin temple where his bloodlust and thirst for vengeance puts him at odds with the monks. When he discovers his sister is captured by the same villains who destroyed his family he leaves the monastery in an attempt to rescue her and avenge what has come upon his family.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: A group of bandits flees with a stolen safe to a village where they oppress the villagers and force the blacksmith Wei to unlock the safe. Wei refuses and flees to report to officials, while heroes of the town emerge to fight the bandits.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers’ claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Big Times for the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again…

programme.title: Brothers from the Walled City
programme.desc: Two orphaned brothers growing up in Kowloon's Walled City - the place where people are forced to live with indecent businesses of sex, gambling and drugs controlled by triads - take very different life paths. Chin works at a cabaret but keeps away from sins, while Kang is drawn to the sleazy underworld. Are their destinies shaped by the “walls”?

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yu’s beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Disciples of the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: In the finale of this trilogy, Gordon Liu reprises his famous role, Monk San Te, as he tries to protect Fang Shih Yu, an arrogant youth who gets into trouble with the Qing officials, and nearly lands Shaolin Temple into trouble too.

programme.title: Young Vagabond
programme.desc: It's a fact: the greatest martial arts movie character is Huang Fei-hung. But it's quite possible the second greatest character is "Beggar Su", one of the famous Ten Kwangtung Tigers, and a legendary Ching Dynasty figure. Little known director Liu Shih-yu decided to fill his telling of the character's life story with the best kung-fu actors Shaw Studios had to offer. He reunited the stars of Liu Chia-liang's landmark Dirty Ho -- Gordon Liu Chia-hui, Wang Yu, and Wang Lung-wei--added such other greats as multi-award-winning Ku Feng and Pai Piao, then gave workhorse Lo Chiang his shot as choreographer. Together they made a rare, colorful, action-packed adventure as Beggar Su and his brother train incessantly to defeat the brutally powerful thief called Centipede. Finally, after much death and destruction, Gordon Liu Chia-hui and Wang Lung-wei get a memorable rematch to follow their classic masterpieces in Dirty Ho and Martial Club. The result is not only reminiscent of preeminent director Liu Chia-liang's work, but essentially an homage to him as well!

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey (Yueh Hua) and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan (Pat Ting Hung), Madam White Bone (Cheng Pei Pei) and her sexy sister (Lily Ho), and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: Shadow Girl
programme.desc: A young swordswoman becomes invisible during the day and a monster at night after taking her grandma’s pill. She ruined the wedding of a bandit chief’s daughter using her powers and is hunted down by them for revenge. Will she escape the hunt?

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Mui’s embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love…

programme.title: Men From The Gutter
programme.desc: Two very different cops are out to capture a local drug boss. In this sizzling crime thriller, the two cops go about doing their jobs differently - one does everything to the letter of the law and the other just doing whatever it takes to solve crime.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wen’s brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wen’s home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards’ heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The General’s henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun’s warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return…

programme.title: The Jade Raksha
programme.desc: A fearsome swordswoman known as The Jade Raksha appears in the martial arts world and begins killing people whose surname is Yan. A swordsman figures out who she is and asks her why. Apparently a Yan killed her family 18 years ago and she only has vengeance on her mind…

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: Opium And The Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Tie Qiao San, head of the Ten Guangdong Tigers, is an honourable master with many disciples. As opium becomes popular among the nobles, Tie starts taking it and gradually harms his body. When an opium house’s owner defeats Tie in a fight and he is only saved from being killed by his disciple, Tie vows to quit opium and get back on his feet.

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: Chiang Yi is blackmailed into a jewelry heist by his former boss, who threatens to expose his shady past. Complications arise when he discovers his first love works at the store.

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keeper’s daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Bao’s chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor’s sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: A Deadly Secret
programme.desc: A corrupt magistrate, obsessed with finding a hidden treasure, jails and tortures his daughter's lover and buries his daughter alive! Ironically, it is in her coffin that the secret to the hidden treasure is found, setting off a frenzy of destruction.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, as she is engaged to another man, they are kept apart. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: Brothers Five
programme.desc: The five Kao brothers, separated since birth, are unaware that the master of Teng Lung Manor has killed their father. All five however, vow to defeat the vicious gangsters at the manor due to their bullying ways. After reuniting and with much discipline and hard work, the Kaos are prepared to face Lung and his gang.

programme.desc: An Andaman tribal who escapes from men trying to capture his people, ends up in the care of a spoilt, rich girl, who starts to fall in love with him. The Film features Jayam Ravi & Sayeesha in the lead roles

programme.title: DNA Ep1
programme.desc: When a little girl disappears in Copenhagen, forensic clues point to a kidnapper in Poland. Inspector Rolf travels there with an unlikely partner – his baby daughter. But tragedy strikes when his daughter suddenly disappears from her pram on the ferry.

programme.title: DNA Ep2
programme.desc: Inspector Rolf tries to find a car thief by matching DNA to possible suspects. His assistant Neel discovers that the thief isn’t on the registry and this prompts Rolf to reflect on the unsolved disappearance of his own baby daughter 5 years ago.

programme.title: To Live To Sing
programme.desc: Zhao Li is the manager of a small Sichuan Opera troupe. When their theater risks getting demolished, she desperately tries to find a new venue. Soon, the line between her bleak reality and the colorful fantasy of opera starts to magically blur.

programme.title: Dr Abel: Decomposed
programme.desc: Inspired by true stories, this thriller covers two grisly crime cases. A young waitress disappears and is held captive by a psychotic doctor. Meanwhile, the head of intelligence of Transnistria defects to the West and leaves a trail of blood behind him.

programme.title: Kuessipan
programme.desc: Growing up together as best friends in an Innu community, Shaniss and Mikuan’s friendship is put to the test when Mikuan falls in love with a white boy and dreams of leaving the reserve they grew up in.

programme.title: Hacker
programme.desc: Benjamin is a 13-year-old orphan and hacking enthusiast. One day, he discovers that, contrary to what he was told, his mother didn’t die in an accident years ago. In his conquest to locate her, he provokes the ire of the Danish Secret Service.

programme.title: Dr Abel: Bruised And Battered
programme.desc: Multiple mutilated women with the words, ‘Respectez Asia’, carved on their skin, have been discovered. Coroner Dr. Abel believes that the suspect in question is innocent and strives to uncover the twisted family tragedy behind the slayings.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Based on true stories retold by Palestinian refugees, this animation focuses on 11 year-old Wardi’s life in a Lebanese camp. One day, her beloved great-grandfather entrusts her with his most prized possession – the key to their ancestral house in Galilea.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: When a Palestinian girl disappears, the Australian media jumps on the news like vultures. She is painted as an Islamic extremist who has joined ISIS. Her family vehemently denies the accusations as they struggle to cope with their grief and confusion.

programme.title: Kuessipan
programme.desc: Growing up together as best friends in an Innu community, Shaniss and Mikuan’s friendship is put to the test when Mikuan falls in love with a white boy and dreams of leaving the reserve they grew up in.

programme.desc: When the police deem her daughter’s runaway case as not a priority, Jeanne has to look for her daughter by herself. Jeanne begins a journey into hell, as she learns that her daughter has become a stranger to her.

programme.title: Hacker
programme.desc: Benjamin is a 13-year-old orphan and hacking enthusiast. One day, he discovers that, contrary to what he was told, his mother didn’t die in an accident years ago. In his conquest to locate her, he provokes the ire of the Danish Secret Service.

programme.title: DNA Ep3
programme.desc: Rolf digs for new DNA material in a bid to uncover more details about the two girls’ disappearances. However, the results of the investigation by Vidt, the officer who took over the case from Rolf, has mysteriously vanished.

programme.title: DNA Ep4
programme.desc: The reopened case of Minna leads Rolf to a witness who has a recorded video of her with some young people in Poland. As investigations gain traction, Rolf digs deeper into his own daughter’s disappearance and another girl in France mysteriously disappears.

programme.title: The Night Guard
programme.desc: Salvador, a security guard working the night shift in Mexico City, attempts to leave his workplace to attend an important engagement elsewhere. When questioned by police about a case, he tells a white lie that soon escalates into dramatic consequences.

programme.title: Dr Abel: Bruised And Battered
programme.desc: Multiple mutilated women with the words, ‘Respectez Asia’, carved on their skin, have been discovered. Coroner Dr. Abel believes that the suspect in question is innocent and strives to uncover the twisted family tragedy behind the slayings.

programme.title: 7 Wishes

programme.desc: When a young woman is murdered in a ‘dark room’ of a Berlin club, Dr. Abel realises a depraved international sex trafficking ring is on his hands. However, the case becomes personal for Abel when his own children vanish in another ‘dark room’ murder.

Then, as a seemingly ordinary bartender, he makes patrons fall for a never-ending beer bottle and a shot that breaks the laws of physics. Plus, he infiltrates an office and has gullible coworkers believing that he can freeze-dry animals and reanimate them.

programme.title: East New York S1 5
programme.desc: The team races to find an escaped prisoner before he finds the cop who put him away – Haywood!

programme.title: Gotham S1 17

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 2
programme.desc: Gentlemen, start your engines! We've got a motorcade of 20 of the dumbest drivers to ever turn an ignition. programme.desc: Posing as a cashier, Michael makes a shopper's face appear on a milk carton and tries to convince her that she really is a missing person. programme.desc: Greed is Good-At the persuasion of Vinnie, Doogie participates as a contestant on “High IQ”, a game show for geniuses. At the hospital, Joe E. Dunn is admitted, complaining of decreased vision.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep13
programme.desc: Blood and Guts-Clayton Kibbee, a handsome, worldly and renowned war correspondent, arrives at the 4077th with the intent of doing a story on the six pints of blood donated to the war effort by some of his readers. Kibbee decides to fictionalize the story of the first pint of blood in order to enliven it. When Hawkeye overhears what is going on he is livid, and points out that this is not a glorious escapade. When the fighting moves and the flow of casualties is lessened, a drunken Kibbe steals B.J.’s newly restored motorcycle and takes his remaining pints of blood with him in search of more battling and perhaps a more dramatic story for the wire. Kibbee crashes during his alcoholic haze and is so severely injured as to need a pint of his own blood. The irony of the situation is not lost on the unfortunate journalist.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S4 Ep12
programme.desc: Angel Hunt-The Angels are lured to Diablo Island by an old enemy of Charlie's who plans to hunt them down and kill them to avenge himself on their boss.

programme.title: The Lucy Show S5 Ep06
programme.desc: Lucy and the Monkey-Mary Jane, Lucy's best friend, keeps telling Lucy she's working much too hard and unless she quits will become subject to hallucinations.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S2 Ep01
programme.desc: The Clock-Mr Grainger's colleagues plan a birthday dinner to mark his long service in the store.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep09
programme.desc: The Empire Builders-Having a railroad built to pass directly through Walnut Grove sounds like a wonderful idea for many town residents, particularly since it would increase the size and popularity of the area.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep10
programme.desc: Love Story-Laura’s childhood friend, Jane Canfield, comes back to Walnut Grove. Despite being blind, she develops a fondness for Isaiah Edwards (who is twice her age) and the two fall in love. Jane’s vision is restored when she receives eye surgery. Isaiah is hopeful about building a future with her, but negative input from his friends turn this into one of the most difficult decisions of his life.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Attack of the Green-Eyed Monster-Wanda becomes jealous when Doogie runs into—and is recognized by—Krista, a beautiful blonde whose shapely leg he had operated on. She invites him to a sorority party at UCLA as Wanda storms off.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S1 Ep16
programme.desc: The Reluctant Dragon-Dan Briggs sends Rollin Hand and Barney behind the Iron Curtain to help a scientist escape to the West and rejoin his wife, who has recently escaped, in "The Reluctant Dragon"

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep13

programme.title: The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes Ep03
programme.desc: The Golden Pince Nez-Inspector Hopkins asks Holmes to investigate when Willoughby Smith, secretary to Professor Coram, is found dead clutching a pince-nez.

programme.title: The Lucy Show S5 Ep07
programme.desc: Lucy and the Efficiency Expert-Efficiency expert Oliver Kasten, who believes employees should function like well-oiled machines rather than human beings, launches a one-man assault on the bank managed by Theodore J. Mooney.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep14
programme.desc: Holy Mess, A-A depressed soldier goes AWOL and ends up at the 4077th in the company of Hawkeye and B.J. They discover that the soldier, Gillis, had just found out his wife was having an affair and acted impetuously. The next morning they take him to Sunday service to talk to Father Mulcahy. When the M.P.s come to arrest Gillis, Father Mulcahy extends him sanctuary. When Potter informs Gillis that the Command Chaplain has decreed that the sanctuary is to be denied in this situation, Gillis pulls a gun, only to be disarmed by a soft-spoken Father Mulcahy.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S1 Ep17
programme.desc: The Frame-The IMF sets out to stop an underworld czar responsible for murdering several government officials in "The Frame"

programme.title: The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes Ep04
programme.desc: The Red Circle-Signor Zamba is murdered by a member of The Red Circle. Gorgiano murders Firmani and pursues Emilia and Gennaro. Mrs Warren asks Holmes to investigate her strange lodger who turns out to be Emilia.

programme.title: The Lucy Show S5 Ep08
programme.desc: Lucy's Substitute Secretary-About to leave on a Lake Arrowhead vacation, Lucy meets Miss Audrey Fields who's been assigned to take over her job as secretary to Mr. Mooney.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep15
programme.desc: The Tooth Shall Set You Free-Major Weems comes to the 4077th, and at first his concern for his wounded black soldiers seems genuine; on further examination it becomes apparent that the Major is in fact highly prejudiced, to the point of trying to eliminate blacks from his unit by transferring them or assigning them to the front lines. When Potter, Hawkeye and B.J. learn the truth they trick Weems into resigning his position with the aid of a black fellow officer named Rockingham, who impersonates a personnel officer. Rockingham is in truth a dentist and extracts the aching tooth that Charles has been dreading to have out.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Trial-Dan Briggs and the IMF are asked to discredit Josef Varsh the tyrannical head of an East European country's secret police, intent on intensifying the cold war in "The Trial"

programme.desc: Pressure Points-Potter calls on psychiatrist Sydney Freedman after Hawkeye must reopen one of Potter’s patients because Potter failed to remove all of the shrapnel. Potter regains his confidence after a few soul-searching sessions with Freedman.

programme.title: A.P. Bio Ep2

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep9
programme.desc: Collective Memory - When a hotshot financial advisor is found shot at a naval station, NCIS investigates the case by interviewing the victim’s three-dimensional hologram of herself, which she created before her death.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep10
programme.desc: Pledge Of Allegiance - NCIS is called in when Navy Chief Warrant Officer Rafi Nazar (Artur Zai Benson) is suspected of trying to sell stolen classified Navy software used to pilot combat drones.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep11
programme.desc: All Hands - After a civilian research vessel in the North Atlantic picks up a small boat of wounded Navy officers, NCIS arrives on the ship and is forced to hide after discovering terrorists on board. Also, Agent Knight takes a paper doll with her on the mission to capture photos for her niece’s grade school class.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep12
programme.desc: Fight Or Flight - When the body of a Navy lieutenant is discovered missing an eye, the NCIS investigation leads to the world of cage fighting.

programme.title: NCIS S19 Ep13
programme.desc: The Helpers - While investigating the death of an intruder at Quantico, Jimmy and Kasie are exposed to a deadly biotoxin, and the NCIS team calls on Doctor Carol Wilson (Meredith Eaton) for help as they race to find the antidote. Also, Torres tries to distract Jimmy’s daughter, who came to the office to spend the day with her dad.
